pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The ngx-srcache NGINX module provides a transparent caching layer for arbitrary NGINX locations (like those use an upstream or even serve static disk files). The caching behavior is mostly compatible with RFC 2616.
Usually, ngx-memc is used together with this module to provide a concrete caching storage backend. But technically, any modules that provide a REST interface can be used as the fetching and storage subrequests used by this module.
